Package infodynamics.utils

Interface Summary
AnalyticNullDistributionComputer Calculators implementing this interface must provide a method to compute the statistical significance of their measurement, returning an analytically determined distribution.
 

Class Summary
AnalyticMeasurementDistribution Generic class to represent analytic distributions of info theoretic measurements under some null hypothesis of a relationship between the variables.
ArrayFileReader  
ArrayFileWriter  
ChiSquareMeasurementDistribution Class to represent analytic distributions of info theoretic measurements under some null hypothesis of a relationship between the variables, where that distribution is a Chi Square distribution.
EmpiricalMeasurementDistribution Structure to hold a distribution of info-theoretic measurements, and a significance value for how an original measurement compared with these.
EuclideanUtils A set of utilities for manipulating vectors in Euclidean space.
FirstIndexComparatorDouble Class used to sort an array of array of doubles based on the first element in each array.
FirstIndexComparatorInteger Class used to sort an array of array of doubles based on the first element in each array.
IntArrayWrapper  
MathsUtils  
MatrixUtils Utilities for computations on matrices, represented as two-dimensional arrays of doubles (double[][] matrix) - it is assumed that all multidimensional matrices have consistent lengths in each dimension matrix[i].
MeasurementDistribution Structure to hold a distribution of info-theoretic measurements, and a significance value for how an original measurement compared with these.
OctaveFileReader Octave file reader.
OctaveFileWriter Octave file format writer.
ParsedProperties  
RandomGenerator Utility to generate arrays of random variables TODO I think I may need to revisit whether I reuse the objects added to the hashtable; I don't think we should be doing this.
